attributes.action: make organ donation compulsory unless you opt out .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 3 people a day die needlessly and 1000s more suffer waiting for organ donations , yet 1000s of organs are wasted daily , currently you have to carry a card , the doctors also asks your relevatives at the worst possible moment , people who say know with the argument i want them in one piece , then choose cremation , lets wake up and sort this out , if doctors remove organs to improve the quality of life for the living , surely that is last  unselfish acts a person can do , when you stand before your god , i cannot think of any reasonable argument against the law being changed

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
